title: Pre-TDD Client Questionnaire v2.0
description: Defines the structure for the initial project data input for the TDD Builder.

project_name.description: The official name of the project.

problem.description: A clear, concise statement of the problem this project solves.

solution.description: A high-level overview of the proposed solution.

stakeholders_and_personas.description: A list of key stakeholders and user personas involved in the project.

quality_goals.description: Top 3-5 non-functional requirements or quality attributes (e.g., performance, reliability).

constraints.description: Known technical, business, or regulatory constraints.

c4_level_1_description.description: A brief description of the system for the C4 context diagram.
